title: Can we got a character like Tendo Pein
body:
Can we get a character like Tendo Pein or all 6 paths, something to manipulate gravity and have some flexibility in what they can do.
Ult could be Shinra Tensei
W shield to absorb a enemy ability
E Throw a minion or monster to deal magic damage
Q Summon a creature to damage nearby enemies (van be directed like Yoricks or Mordiekaisers ult

just a concept idea not saying have to do this
